ocr_qa.question: What are the consulting firms listed in the title block?
ocr_qa.answer: 6 consulting firms: Foster + Partners, Arup, OLIN, KIER & WRIGHT, alta and WATRY DESIGN, INC.
evidence: The title block lists the consulting firms: Foster + Partners, Arup, OLIN, KIER & WRIGHT, alta and WATRY DESIGN, INC.

ocr_qa.question: What is the client of the project written on the title block?
What is the project name written on the title block?
What scale is listed in the title block for this plan?
evidence: The 'Scale @ Arch E1' field in the title block reads '1"=64''. on the bottom-right corner.

ocr_qa.question: What is the internal radius of the circular building?
evidence: The internal radius of the circular building is 580'-11".

ocr_qa.question: What is the external (outer) radius of the circular building?
evidence: The external (outer) radius of the circular building is 760'-7".

ocr_qa.question: What is the size of Restaurant space in square feet?
evidence: The Restaurant space is labeled as '58,000 square feet'.

ocr_qa.question: What is the name of the road labeled to the right side of the plan?
evidence: The right edge of the sheet contains the label 'TANTAU AVENUE' beside the site boundary.

spatial_qa.question: Which side of the ring (north, south, east, or west), on the drawing, has the Apple transit center Bus drop off area?
evidence: On the drawing, the east side of the ring has the Apple transit center Bus drop off area.

counting_qa.question: How many labeled access blocks are distributed around the building ring?
evidence: Nine rectangular core blocks appear around the circular ring.

counting_qa.question: How many radial pedestrian paths originate from the courtyard center and extend outward?
evidence: Nine radial paths extend from the center circle toward the ring.

comparison_qa.question: Which quadrant of the circular building is closer to the Tantau Auditorium and Visitor Parking Structure?
comparison_qa.answer: Quadrant 4 or the bottom right corner.
evidence: Quadrant 4 of the circular buidling is closer to the Tantau Auditorium and Visitor Parking Structure.
